721028f-a.title: Manhattan: Lexington Avenue - 53rd Street
721028f-a.text:
Lexington Ave., west side, north from 53rd Street, showing at the
S.W. corner of 55th Street, the Synagogue of the Congregation Ahawath
Chesed Shaar Hashomayim, also known as the Central Synagogue.
January 7, 1928.
P. L. Sperr
r,1  113D 7)
NO REPRODUCTIONS.  (4 5, S  lEG
(2)
The same, one block northward. Aoross the top appears the upper
portion of the Rits Tower, at the N.E. corner of Park Ave. and 57th
Street.
October 12, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

713644f-a.title: Manhattan: 53rd Street (East) - Lexington Avenue
713644f-a.text:
140 East 53rd Street, adjoining the S.E. corner of Lexington Ave.
March 28, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
